comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

* Open the attached PNG file in Firefox
* Right-click the image
* Click "Copy image"
* Paste into a drawing program, e.g. Paint.NET


Actual results:

The entire image is darker than the original. For example, the top-left pixel is actually #c0c0c0 in the image file, but the copied image has it changed to #bebebe.


Expected results:

The image should be copied without any such alteration.
comments.author: timwi@gmx.net
comments.text:
Created attachment 585127
Example image

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

* Open the attached PNG file in Firefox
* Right-click the image
* Click "Copy image"
* Paste into a drawing program, e.g. Paint.NET


Actual results:

The entire image is darker than the original. For example, the top-left pixel is actually #c0c0c0 in the image file, but the copied image has it changed to #bebebe.


Expected results:

The image should be copied without any such alteration.
